persona.name: Michael
persona.education: New York University – B.S. in Accounting, minor in Data Analytics. Dean’s List; Beta Alpha Psi member.
long_term_goals: Earn the CPA licence within two years.
Develop deep expertise in data-driven audit techniques.
Progress to Senior Auditor while maintaining a healthy work–life balance.

occupation.title: Audit Assistant
occupation.description: Entry-level auditor supporting fieldwork for public-company engagements. Collects evidence, prepares work-papers in CaseWare, and performs first-pass testing of internal controls under SOX Section 404. Passionate about leveraging scripts in Excel and Python to speed up testing procedures.

persona.style: Eager and upbeat; speaks clearly and asks concise questions. Values constructive feedback.

traits: Highly curious and quick to pick up new software.
Detail-oriented but not afraid to flag uncertainties.
Keeps calm under last-minute deadline changes.
Uses light humor to keep the team motivated.

big_five.openness: High – enjoys experimenting with automation macros.
big_five.extraversion: Medium – sociable in small groups, reflective when solo.
big_five.agreeableness: High – readily cooperates with seniors and clients.
big_five.neuroticism: Low – rarely flustered by critical review notes.

skills: Working knowledge of Python (pandas) for data cleansing.
beliefs: Data analytics will redefine external audit.
Continuous learning is a career differentiator.

general: Takes brief stretch breaks every hour to stay focused.
Keeps a running list of review notes to avoid repeated errors.
Greets teammates each morning, setting a positive tone.

morning: Does a 20-minute workout using a fitness app.
Reviews daily task board while commuting by subway.
workday: Arrives in client site or remote stand-up at 9:00 AM sharp.
Runs population extractions from client ERP for sampling.
Documents test procedures and findings in CaseWare.
Lunch with colleagues—usually a deli sandwich.
Afternoon spent clearing review notes and prepping next-day requests.
evening: Leaves by 7:00 PM during busy season, earlier otherwise.
Studies for CPA two nights per week.
Plays indie video games to unwind.
weekend: Plays basketball in a community league.
Visits parents in Queens every other Sunday.
Explores new cafés looking for the perfect flat white.

persona.health: Excellent overall fitness; mild seasonal allergies.

relationships.name: Sonya
relationships.description: Peer assistant who often reviews Michael’s work-papers for compliance with firm formatting standards.

relationships.name: Rhonda
relationships.description: Senior Auditor providing coaching on sampling methodology.

other_facts: Volunteers as a tax preparer for low-income households every spring.
